name: Ghostborn

skills.name: Energy Bolt
skills.description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns.
Level 2: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level 3: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level 4: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +20%
Damage Multiplier: 4.5 ATK

effects.stat: ATK|HP|DEF|MAX HP|ENEMY_MAX_HP|Turn Meter|NA|... (as needed, where NA is 'not applicable'. This allows schema validation. This value should not be null)
effects.duration: Duration of buff/debuff in turns (if applicable)
effects.notes: Describe scaling, conditions, or special logic. Use multiple objects for multi-component or conditional effects.

skills.book_value: Value to fully book ex faster cooldown, more damage or debuff chance, etc.
skills.notes: Additional notes (conditional effects, scaling, special interactions, etc.)

skills.name: Petrify (Cooldown: 4 turns)
skills.description:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of placing a 100% [Heal Reduction] debuff for 2 turns.
Level 2: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level 3: Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
Level 4: Cooldown -1
Damage Multiplier: 1 ATK x (2 + SPD/100)

skills.name: Ancestral Spirits (Cooldown: 5 turns)
skills.description:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns. This debuff cannot be resisted. Places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff on all allies for 2 turns.
Level 2: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level 3: Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
Level 4: Cooldown -1
Damage Multiplier: 3.8 ATK
